mapper.select: SELECT attendance_no attendanceNo, user_no userNo, checkin_time checkInTime, checkout_time checkOutTime, checkin_sms checkInSMS, checkout_sms checkOutSMS FROM attendance ORDER BY attendance_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attendance(user_no,checkin_time,checkin_sms) SELECT user_no userNo, now(), 0 FROM user_detail WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT user_no FROM attendance WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND month(checkin_time) = month(sysdate()) AND dayofmonth(checkin_time) = dayofmonth(sysdate())
mapper.update: UPDATE attendance SET checkin_sms = 1 WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND month(checkin_time) = month(sysdate()) AND dayofmonth(checkin_time) = dayofmonth(sysdate())
